channel.title: [317] Client Background
channel.description: Okay I have made my client background, but I am wondering where and what I add to what file to make it load.

item.title: [317] Client Background
item.dc:creator: @kingman002 kingman002
item.description:
@kingman002 wrote:

Thanks Kono-Chan. I always work off 317 deobs.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Client Background
item.dc:creator: @Kono-chan Kono-chan
item.description:
@Kono-chan wrote:

[quote=“I am beast, post:6, topic:413611”][quote author=Kono-chan link=topic=515109.msg3740161#msg3740161 date=1315269547]

You don’t need to use Tom’s Cache Editor to edit the background, those are packed sprites. Just go into the sprites folder, and replace the old one, with the new one.

implying everyone suck and does it the retarded way

It’s not in media, it’s in Jagex Archive -> title.jag
[/quote]

Most 317 clients I have seen, NEVER pack their backgrounds. Not that DSPK shit, I’m talking real 317’s.[/quote]

Because people are too stupid or don’t care enough to actually do things the CORRECT way.

kingman002:

Thanks, Kono-Chan, now I can’t figure out why the Rune(sword)Scape logo will not go away.

Look for the drawLogo method in the client class, if your client’s renamed…

Find this:

sprite = new Sprite(titleStreamLoader, "logo", 0); aRSImageProducer_1107.initDrawingArea(); sprite.drawSprite(382 - sprite.myWidth / 2 - 128, 18); sprite = null;

Comment it all out.

Read full topic
